name: It Consumes
description:
It Consumes is a game made over the month of September 2022 for the MinnHax game jam, hosted by MinnMax. It's a wave-based FPS with no light, and is probably not about getting better. 

Headphones are recommended, as the the game makes heavy use of spatial audio. 

I will continue to update the game for the next little while (and possibly beyond that), fixing bugs and polishing/adding some features.
